startNewGame() - Method in class Collecto.Server
Checks if there are at least 2 players in queue and if there are - handles process of creating new game: randomly determines the first player to start, creates a new Game instance adds and sets these two player as in-game players and calls PlayerHandler.startNewGame(Game, PlayerHandler) to trigger game start for both player clients.
startNewGame(Game, PlayerHandler) - Method in class Collecto.PlayerHandler
Triggers the start of a new game.
